title: REALLY RIOT???????
body: really though.....why hasnt riot put a stop the people using botting programs running peoples accounts? played three games of aram in a row with four bots on my team all they did was feed i lost the game in less then 10 mins....IM SICK OF THIS! How can anyone enjoy the game????{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} """ARAM"""

replies.body:
technically speaking, you can never put a stop to botting.

The scripters will come out with a new program with new movements and behavior, Riot will then develop new methods to detect them and ban them in waves (harder for the scripters to know what got them caught), and the scripters will come up with a new program again.

Riot can only play catch up against them. 

That being said, if you raise your MMR enough, then you'll stop playing with bots.

sorry i should have been clear as for what game mode, and honestly i dont think it has much to do with MMR but anyways. this only happens to me in aram.....and mostly mornings lol but i do understand what you mean

every game mode has MMR, not just in ranked.

that way, people in cardboard division won't be matched with challengjours.
Does MMR really have anything to do with games of aram and im really asking because i dont know. I quit playing ranked a long time ago due to the fact of how bad people act over losses

every game mode has separate MMRs, while they gently splash between each other, they have different MMRs.

a gold player will be able to zone more effectively than cardboard players. They will also abuse CDs more and be able to siege more effectively.

If gold players were matched with cardboards in everygame (even in ARAM), it'll be a super stomp that it's not even fun anymore (for both parties).

Win more ARAM games and get a better MMR in ARAM and there will be less bots in the games.
well, cant win them if im running into this right? I have over 900 wins....a lot more then my losses yet i still would have a low MMR?
MMR Is like a less set in stone version of ELO
Its impossible to make the game script proof. as Kei stated, they will always figure out new bypasses.
Yeah true, i mean i only seen this start happening at the end of last year..they are flooding pretty bad these days
You do seem truely concerned, if you want the best experience, queue with a friend or two, it GARENtees being matched with another duo/trio, so, no bots!

well wouldnt you be concerned? i mean getting into a game with the so called "players" just running in feeding? as for someone like myself who dont play normal games anymore? aram can be lots of fun but if you run into what i have been it kinda sucks....

I haven't ran into any, and aram is kinda my jam. As the above people have said continuing to play and raising your mmr is the best way to stop having them on your team. If you are not a bot then that means that you have a statistically higher chance to not have a bot on your team since you take up a slot. That means that you have a higher chance to win and therefore should be able to rise easily.
